message: The RATIONALE field for indicator 11-10-1, translated into en
data: The indicator is important to assess the situation of new rural construction. Building a new countryside to improve the material and spiritual life of the people; have appropriate socio-economic infrastructure; economic structure and forms of production organization rationally, linking agricultural development with industry and service; linking rural development with urban areas; a democratic, equal and stable rural society, rich in national cultural identity; ecological environment is protected; national defense and security and order are maintained.
